metadata.title: CVE-2023-52809 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: scsi:libfc: Fix potential NULL pointer dereference in fc_lport_ptp_setup()fc_lport_ptp_setup() did not check the return value of fc_rport_create()which can return NULL and would cause a NULL pointer dereference. Addressthis issue by checking return value of fc_rport_create() and log errormessage on fc_rport_create() failed.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
